name: Kashuu Kiyomitsu
ability: Skill attacks have a slight chance of inflicting Stun.

additional_data.description: The spirit of one of the favorite swords of Okita Soji, top team leader of the Shinsengumi. They made it through many tough fights together, even having a sort of rivalry with one another to see who's better. Now, she's concerned about his illness and feels she has to work extra hard to make up for his weakened state. And she believes everything he says, even when he's joking.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ "Meiji Monster on a Rampage" Get a First Half or Second Half Ranking of 2500 and above.
◦ "Meiji Monster on a Rampage" Event: Get a Total Ranking of 4000 and above.
additional_data.notes_and_trivia: ◦ Increases the total Event Points by Small during the "Meiji Monster on a Rampage" event.

skill: "I can find a way through any battle."
limit_break: "I must put my full power into this fight!"
